web-app.description: University: UCF Class: CNT 4713 Date: 7 / 2021 Instructor: Dr. Llewellyn Student: Artem Ivanov - NID: 4131859

servlet.description: A servlet that takes text from a front-end jsp and connects to a MySQL db, queries from the front end are executed against the database and results are returned to display on the web app.
